goal.ch:
主要培養學生以下能力： 
一、閱讀專書與論文的能力 
二、整理文獻、報告表達的能力 
三、獨立思考、學術研究的能力
goal.en:
The main objective is to cultivate the following abilities in students:  
1. The ability to read books and research papers  
2. The ability to organize literature and present reports  
3. The ability to think independently and conduct academic research

outline.ch:
預計將從以下幾個主題中選擇一個進行深入探討與雙向討論：
一、通訊理論及其應用（Communication Theory and its Applications）
二、資訊理論及其應用（Information Theory and its Applications）
三、量子資訊理論及其應用（Quantum Information Theory and its Applications）
先備知識要求：線性代數、機率導論（大學部程度）。
註：歡迎大學部學生選課！（系統會擋修，請另外向我拿密碼卡加選）
若有任何問題或需要更多資訊，請隨時e-mail聯繫我。
outline.en:
The course will focus on one of the following topics for in-depth exploration and interactive discussion:
1. Communication Theory and its Applications
2. Information Theory and its Applications
3. Quantum Information Theory and its Applications
Prerequisite knowledge: Linear Algebra, Introduction to Probability (undergraduate level).
Note: Undergraduate students are welcome to enroll! (The system may block enrollment, please contact me directly for the enrollment password.)
If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to email me.
